package io.persephone.dsl.element

import io.persephone.dsl.Tag
import io.persephone.dsl.element.*

// generated by HtmlDslGenerator.kt
class SELECT : Tag(tagName = "select", selfClosing = false) {

	var dropzone: String?
		get() = attributes.getOrNull("dropzone")
		set(value) {
			value?.let {
				attributes["dropzone"] = it
			}
		}

	var exportparts: String?
		get() = attributes.getOrNull("exportparts")
		set(value) {
			value?.let {
				attributes["exportparts"] = it
			}
		}

	var spellcheck: String?
		get() = attributes.getOrNull("spellcheck")
		set(value) {
			value?.let {
				attributes["spellcheck"] = it
			}
		}

	var translate: String?
		get() = attributes.getOrNull("translate")
		set(value) {
			value?.let {
				attributes["translate"] = it
			}
		}

	fun optgroup(
		dropzone: String? = null,
		exportparts: String? = null,
		spellcheck: String? = null,
		translate: String? = null,
		init: (OPTGROUP.() -> Unit)? = null
	) = initTag(OPTGROUP.(), init).apply {
		this.dropzone = dropzone
		this.exportparts = exportparts
		this.spellcheck = spellcheck
		this.translate = translate
	}

	fun option(
		dropzone: String? = null,
		exportparts: String? = null,
		spellcheck: String? = null,
		translate: String? = null,
		init: (OPTION.() -> Unit)? = null
	) = initTag(OPTION.(), init).apply {
		this.dropzone = dropzone
		this.exportparts = exportparts
		this.spellcheck = spellcheck
		this.translate = translate
	}

}
